Multipurpose: tissues with designs to fit for your living room, dinning table, bedroom, kitchen, office, bathroom, car, school / classroom and more

body.description: Scotties, Comfort by DesignSoftness you can feel, anywhere you need it.Soft and affordable with styles that fit any room. That’s Scotties. Scotties Facial has a selection of tissue product that’s right for you; choose from Everyday Comfort, Ultra Plush, or a touch of Soothing Aloe. Everyday ComfortBe prepared in every room of your home with Scotties Facial. Everyday Comfort 2‑ply softness comes in a range of box designs to suit your style. We're ScottiesScotties Facial Tissue is made by Irving Consumer Products, Inc., a J.D. Irving Company and family-owned business with over 100 years of forestry heritage and a commitment to producing quality products in a sustainable manner that benefits our customers, communities, and the environment.About UsFrom seed to shelf, when you choose Scotties products, you have our promise that we have actively managed the chain of custody (tracks forest fiber content through production and manufacturing to the end product) for all material we use. We’re recognized internationally for contributions to ecosystem research and habitat conservation. And, J.D. Irving, Limited is a North American leader in reforestation. Sustainability is our business and as an industry leader, we understand the bigger picture, using the most advanced tools and technology to better understand our forests each day.Scotties is a registered trademark of Kimberly Clark Worldwide, Inc. used under license by Irving Consumer Products, Inc. trademarks of Irving Consumer Products Limited. Used under license.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Everyday Comfort Be prepared in every room of your home with Scotties Facial Everyday Comfort 2-ply tissue. It's the soft, strong and affordable choice for day-to-day sneezes, sniffles, tears, and makeup removal. Our tissues are hypoallergenic, and free of toxins and dyes. Choose from a wide range of box designs to suit your home or office, with 3 different box types: Cube Boxes - compact and versatile to fit a variety of spacesFlat Boxes - the boxes you know and love with multiple designs and sheet counts to suit your needsReach-In Boxes - convenient grab-and-go opening with the most tissues per box

Made in North America Scotties Facial is proudly made in North America and is always soft and affordable with styles that fit any room. Whether it’s Everyday Comfort, Triple Soft, or Soothing Aloe Triple Soft, Scotties Facial has a selection of tissue products that’s right for you. Scotties Helps We’re a family-owned business and giving back to our local communities is incredibly important to us. The Tree Growing Company Every time a household paper product manufactured by Irving Consumer Products Limited is purchased, consumers show their support for responsible forest management and tree planting. In our effort to reforest the woodlands of the Acadian forest land we manage, we have planted over 1 billion trees since 1957.

Everyday Comfort Triple Soft Soothing Aloe Triple Soft # of Plys 2 3 3 Available Box Type Flat, Reach-In, Cube Cube Cube Fragrance Free & Hypoallergenic ✓ ✓ ✓ SFI third-party audit and certification of chain of custody & fiber sourcing ✓ ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the box
reviews.reviewText: This box is a combination of an open-top box with the pop-up box. I love it, since you can get tissues out without digging down into the box. The tissues themselves are fine, and I feel it is a good value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Softness and Strength for Everyday Comfort
reviews.reviewText: Scotties Everyday Comfort Facial Tissues have become my go-to choice for softness and strength, providing gentle care for my nose and face every day! This pack includes four boxes, each containing 92 tissues, ensuring I always have a reliable and comforting tissue on hand.I am impressed with the softness of these facial tissues, which feels gentle and soothing against my skin, making them perfect for daily use.The tissues are remarkably strong, offering durability and tear resistance, ensuring they hold up to my needs without any worry of ripping.The pack of four boxes is a convenient option for stocking up on facial tissues, whether I'm at home, in the office, or on the go.Each box features 92 tissues, providing ample supply to last for an extended period, reducing the need for frequent replacements.I appreciate the commitment of Scotties to responsible forestry, as these facial tissues are made from sustainably sourced materials.The soft and hypoallergenic nature of these tissues makes them suitable for individuals with sensitive skin or allergies.In conclusion, Scotties Everyday Comfort Facial Tissues are the epitome of gentle care and reliability for my everyday needs. Their softness, strength, and convenient pack of four boxes make them an excellent choice for various settings. Whether I'm dealing with a common cold or simply needing a tissue for everyday use, Scotties never fail to provide the comfort and quality I expect. Embrace the softness and strength of Scotties Facial Tissues and experience a touch of everyday comfort with each tissue!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good tissue - good price
reviews.reviewText: They fit my dispenser nicely and this was the best deal I found, price wise.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Ah, tissues with NO odors at last!
reviews.reviewText: The past few months, many major brands and even 2 store brands of facial tissues have been smelling of gear grease (which in layman's terms is - like dog poop) or like laundry perfume sent like Tide (of which I am allergic to.) I am not sure how many factories are involved - but for me that was 2 major brands / 2 big store brands - that are permanently on my naughty list. I have year round allergies/nose issues/asthma - so no odors is critical path. I am happy to say that I've opened 4 boxes to set out in the house already / tested / sniffed - lol / thank the heavens above - Scotties is truly sent free! \o\ \o/ /o/ Now - these are the "reach-in" style boxes with the big cut scoop out of the front. I put only 4 stars because the 2 ply is normal softness level. But they have a 3 ply Plus tissue - that they were out of stock when I bought this case. They seem to only be online in the small cube boxes / lower tissue count - but if your nose is sore / tender issues, that's the one I plan to get a case and have for any bad winter colds that might happen. In the past, Scotties plush was worth it for those times. I hope this helps anyone else that has been searching the last couple of months for just a normal tissue that does NOT stink of off odors.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Tissues for my sore runny nose..
reviews.reviewText: I was glad to see we can get these things by the case I’ve been dealing with nasal infections and these are the greatest issues in the world. They’re soft and they just make your nose feel comfortable even when it’s sore.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on April 11, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Larger boxes than stores Edited on 5/31/22
reviews.reviewText: We use quite a few tissues in this house. I was always running out to purchase them at the Dollar Tree. As you may know, that could be hit or miss. Most of the time it was a miss. When I found these Scotties on Amazon, realized they were a much larger box and at a decent price, it was a no-brainer. I'm so pleased that I put these on auto-ship and I can control my order if necessary. I'm very pleased with this product as well as the delivery.5/31/22 -- UpdateReceived another shipment of tissues today. I am so disappointed in the packaging. 6 out of the 12 boxes were so badly crushed on the sides that the tissues rip upon removal. I have tried "fixing" the ends of the boxes in hopes it will help. What I don't understand, these boxes were packaged inside a sealed box that was put in yet another box along with the rest of my order. Therefore, these individual boxes of tissues were packed already damaged in the original shipping box. If I receive my next order in the same manner, I will cancel further shipments. I have taken off 2 stars from my original review.
